name: Shooter's Barrel
description: A Light Bowgun made only in Pokke Village. Made for easy use in arctic zones.

name: Chain Blitz
description: Experimental technology for rapid fire functions. Rapid Fire of Normal S Lv1.

name: Shotgun (Azure)
description: Utilizes a straight frame to allow the use of Pellet Shells.

name: Shotgun (White)
description: Beautiful Light Bowgun. Stopping power due to Pellet S Lvl with Rapid Fire.

name: Shotgun (Green)
description: Upgraded to increase efficiency and effectiveness by implementing Para S.

name: Desert Storm
description: Light Bowgun tuned for high speed reloading. Perfect for fights on the go.

name: Maelstrom
description: Bowgun designed for ammo versatility rather than power. Rapid Fire Water S.

name: Shotgun (Blood)
description: Upgraded to increase efficiency and effectiveness by implementing Poison S.

name: Tail String
description: Light Bowgun wrapped in white Blango Pelt. Prototype for Rapid Fire of Freeze S.

name: Assault Conga
description: Rapid Fire Pierce S Lvl capable. Its shock-absorbing fur is also flameproof.

name: Jade Storm
description: All-purpose Bowgun that fires a range of shots. Rapid Fire of Normal S Lv2.

name: Lobster Gun
description: Bowgun made from the shell of a King Lobster. Capable of Rapid Fire with Water S.

name: Angel Parasol
description: Found in the possession of a captured spy, the Guild has denied any involvement.

name: Kut-Ku Anger
description: Lightweight Bowgun made from the head of Yian Kut-Ku. Explodes with hatred.

name: Kut-Ku Rage
description: Bowgun with the fierce gaze of Yian Kut-Ku. It wells up with his rage.

name: Grenade Launcher
description: Designed to accommodate low- and mid-level ammunition. Rapid Fire of Crag S Lv1.

name: Sandfall
description: Features miniaturized high speed loading mechanism for Rapid Fire of Normal S Lv2

name: Sakura Parasol
description: Replica of a weapon used by a famous novel protagonist. Rapid Fire of Thunder S.

name: Tail String+
description: Wrapped in Blangonga Pelt. Rapid Fire of Freeze S. Supports special shots.

name: Valkyrie Fire
description: Optimized for hunting lone monsters. Can only use a limited range of ammo.

name: Spartacus Fire
description: Light Bowgun optimized for one-on-one monster combat. Improved power.

name: Titan Launcher
description: A Light Bowgun designed to accommodate mid- and high-level ammunition.

name: Uranos Grenade
description: Black Bowgun with annihilating power. Rapid Fire of Flaming S.

name: Tigrex Tank
description: Specially shaped and made of Tigrex, this has explosive firepower for real combat.

name: Demonlock
description: Unknown origins: however, shows signs of Guild design, Its effective power is high.

name: Felyne Ragdoll
description: Modified Felyne stuffed toy. Can fire Normal S Lv1 and Flaming S with Rapid Fire.

name: Melynx Ragdoll
description: Modified Melynx stuffed toy. Can fire Normal S Lv1 and Flaming S with Rapid Fire.

name: dummy (Amezari Bowgun)
description: dummy.

name: Blessed Lamp
description: Made from Chameleos into a unique Light Bowgun. Rubbing it has no effect.

name: Black Belt Bowgun
description: A Bowgun that recalls the blood and sweat of training. Rapid Fire of Thunder S.

name: Black Parasol
description: Said to hold a dark power. Jet black umbrella has an assassins thirst for death.

name: Raven Do
description: Black gun made from Yian Garuga materials. Fires shots with a monster's roar.

name: Valkyrie Heart
description: Fires Normal S Lv2 with Rapid Fire. Made for 1-on-1 battles.

name: Azure Sakura
description: Dual-purpose weapon. Can Rapid Fire both Normal S Lv2 and Pierce S Lvl.

name: Spartacus Soul
description: Fires Pierce S Lv1 with Rapid Fire. Made for 1-on-1 battles.

name: Aqua Blade Shower
description: Inherits the traits of lower models, but with improved firepower and attack range.

name: Maelstrom+
description: Wide compatibility makes this an epic Light Bowgun. Rapid Fire of Water S.

name: Green Blade Shower
description: Capable of facing wyverns, by using attribute shots. Truly tests ones skills.

name: Grenade Launcher+
description: Upgraded Grenade Launcher popular for speedy loading. Rapid Fire of Crag S Lv1.

name: Desert Tempest
description: In order to strengthen the firing chamber to the limit, rare metals have been used.

name: Hornet Gun
description: This Bowgun uses Hornetaur material in the frame for increased power.

name: Crimson Blade Shower
description: A glamorous weapon with wide compatibility that easily handles a support role.

name: King Lobster Gun
description: Uses quality shell to raise power. Capable of waterfall-like Water S Rapid Fire.

name: Valkyrie Blaze
description: Ultimate Bowgun to counter large monsters. Best when used at short to mid-range.

name: Great Crossbow Gun
description: Light Bowgun well suited for element and assist shots. Excellent for rear support.

name: Assault Conga+
description: Rapid Fire Pierce S Lvl capable. Its shock-absorbing fur is also flameproof.

name: Spartacus Blaze
description: Ultimate Bowgun to counter large monsters. Best when used at short to mid-range.

name: Tail Catapult
description: Bowgun wrapped in Blangonga Pelt+. Blizzard-like Rapid Fire of Freeze S.

name: Titan Launcher+
description: Offensive Bowgun built with powerful munitions in mind. Uses enormous rounds.

name: Tigrex Wargun
description: Light Bowgun made with tenacious Tigrex materials. Experimental. High power.

name: Hidden Gaze
description: Darker than outer space. High-caliber, double-barrel fires Rapid Fire Crag S Lvl.

name: Bullet Storm

name: Jade Tempest
description: Takes usability and adds Rapid Fire of Normal S Lv2 for tempest-like firepower.

name: Sandfall+
description: Element shot load mechanism. Rapid Fire of Normal SS Lv2 gives birth to a sandstorm.

name: Peach Parasol

name: Chronos Grenade

name: Crimson Blue
description: Unleashes the tremendous firepower of a hybrid frame. Useful vs. wyverns.

name: Cursed Lamp

name: Spartacus Soul+
